long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MarkMark is a macOS app designed to help you collect and organize articles, websites, and all kinds of web pages. It's not just a bookmarks app or a read-it-later app, but goes beyond these functionalities.

This extension helps users collect webpages directly from the toolbar on Chrome.

MarkMark for macOS needs to be installed and running for this extension to work.

You can download MarkMark from App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id6475077023?pt=126819514&ct=chrome-web-store&mt=8
